profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-06 07:06:13 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Task Force on the Undergraduate Experience

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has one series: First year advising booklets.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains first-year advising booklets for incoming students from the Dean of Advising.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: In about 2014, the office restructured and changed its name to the Office of Academic Advising and Undergraduate Studies, which encompasses the Associate Deans of Undergraduate Education, the Academic Resource Center, and professional advising staff. The office provides academic support, educational programs, and opportunities for research and post-graduate fellowships for graduate students and undergraduates in the schools of Arts and Sciences and Engineering.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.
